item.nether-flask.tooltip-imbuehint: Use with Potion in Off-Hand to Imbue!
item.nether-flask.upgrade.purging-stone: Use in Off-Hand whilst wielding Netherflask to remove effect!
item.nether-flask.upgrade.flask-shard: Use in Off-Hand whilst wielding Netherflask to increase uses!
item.nether-flask.upgrade.bone-dust: Use in Off-Hand whilst wielding Netherflask to increase power!
item.nether-flask.upgrade.campfirehint: User must be near Starkindled Campfire!
